message: Let's be reasonable, Bob. This offer is in your best interest if we want to avoid inflation eating our money.
Alice, my turn. I understand your point about inflation, let's settle this quickly. This offer is fair and benefits us both.
Bob, this is getting us nowhere. I'm being realistic, let's settle before inflation hurts us both even more.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous. Let's just split it evenly and call it a day.  Any more rounds and the inflation will just make us both losers.
